website_summaries.verdict: A solid topper option that sells for about a quarter of the cost of some other models.
pros: Consumers appreciated the good value for the cost as well as the quality and feel of this topper
Some remarked it helped with back pain
It stands out for its softness, comfort, and lack of odor
cons: Not everyone felt it was as cool as expected
may not fit the mattress exactly

customer_reviews.title: Now I have to buy a new topper.
customer_reviews.text: I love my mattress topper. It is so comfortable. There is a tear in one of the "humps" of the egg crate. It doesn't effect the comfort, and aesthetics is of no importance. I'd buy it again Update: 02/02/19- there is now a tear in the topper about the length of my forearm at the very top in the middle. This is not an extention of the original tear but a new tear. I'm very disappointed. I'm going to have to buy a new topper now. This is horrible. Terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Outspoken

customer_reviews.title: A great nights sleep to be had👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Takes away all my aches and pains I would have otherwise suffered without it! I do get heat flashes though- and the cooling technology is not very effective. So if your looking for cooling relief- look somewhere else. It is what it is- aside from that- this topper is amazing! And I didn’t notice any type of unpleasant smell from this product. 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Joy from Warren, MI

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: The memory foam topper arrived unboxed it and allowed it to set on the floor flat for 2 days and then put it on the bed and it fits perfect on our king size bed. Did have to trim a little bit around the edges so that the sheets will fit properly but it's better than being too little lol. It is 3" thick and we've had it now for 3 weeks and I sleep perfect now. Our old mattress topper was just a Memory foam topper and did not have the cooling gel like this one does... I have not experienced heat build-up coming from this memory foam topper yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: TEARING/FALLING APART!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly liked the product at first. Very comfortable and helped with my back pain. That said, it is already tearing apart everywhere! Falling apart more and more every time I wash/change my sheets, I notice more tears. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for back pain
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. I nought what i thought was s grest maytress it wasnt. I was waking with back pain slept over my brothers one night frlt fabulous in morning asked what kind of mattress cover do you have n it was a eggshell topper. I bought the 3” one m love it have not woke with back pain since. By the way ive had 2 back surgeries so i know this topper has truly worked.
customer_reviews.author: New Horizons

customer_reviews.title: This is truely a good Quality product
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful! I got the double bed, 3 inch thick size for a guest room bed. the mattress is true to size. It is a cool and comfortable mattress. There is no unpleasant odor to the mattress and only took a few hours to expand properly. I actually think it is more comfortable than the 4 inch egg crate mattress I have on my queen size bed. The coolness and gel swirl memory must account for this fact. When I am in need of another convoluted mattress this will be the one I purchase. I can not say enough of what a wonderful company LINSPA .They answer emails and care about their customers. The price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Fay

customer_reviews.title: My back is thankful
customer_reviews.text: Old bed wasn’t working for me, so I added this gel foam. The bed is great. Best nights sleep in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Brethauer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cushioning Top to Mattress
customer_reviews.text: This pad came compressed in a fairly small box. When I opened it up I did not think it would puff up to what the picture looked like, but I left it alone overnight and it did! It did have a chemical smell to it at first that took a couple of days to dissipate. It definitely adds a good cushioning feel to the bed. For me it also seemed to make the bed warmer (almost too warm for summer time use). If you need that additional cushioning top to your mattress this seems to be a good solution.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Falling Apart and Driving Me INSANE
customer_reviews.text: At first it was great, but then it started tearing down by my feet. The material is cracking and tearing all down the middle and sides, so basically there is a big hole. It is awful. I've tried taping it back together from underneath but it just keeps getting worse and it's too late to return it. There is something very wrong with the product I received. I am so frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: The Bird Lady

customer_reviews.title: This mattress topper is really comfortable. It fit our queen bed perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This mattress topper is really comfortable. It fit our queen bed perfectly. The memory foam felt great. There was a manufactured smell at first, but it dissipated quickly and is almost non-existent now. Our sheets still fit really well, even though it added 3 inches to the top of the mattress. When it came, it was really compressed, but after a time it expanded nicely. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: My back is killing me and it fell apart.
customer_reviews.text: It puffed up nicely but when we laid on it it squished down, became hard and dense and gave no support. I was hoping I would adjust but my back is now killing me. I also noticed that it started breaking down already. We are not massive people so I was surprised that it would already have breaks in it after just a few weeks. All said it is going back and I am going to try a natural latex one.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy from CA

customer_reviews.title: Save money buy this topper
customer_reviews.text: After my child left home with her bed we bought a inexpensive new mattress then threw this topper and a Easeland quilted fitted mattress pad on an inexpensive platform, storage bed. Everyone, including my daughter when she comes home, remarks how comfy this bed is. Next time I have to replace a mattress, I am going the route of buying a firm inexpensive mattress and putting this topper and the mattress pad on it. No more thousand dollars of mattresses that don't even last 5 years. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: D Pag

customer_reviews.title: This mattress is super comfortable. I bought it for a twin bed ...
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is super comfortable. I bought it for a twin bed that I keep in my daughter's nursery for late nights and nursing when I'm exhausted. It has transformed my very hard mattress into somewhere I don't mind sleeping. The only reason I pulled a star is that I wasn't aware of how much heat this thing would hold. It gets very warm very fast with two people putting out heat. Other than that it's wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Star

customer_reviews.title: It is the closest to a waterbed comfortable sleep we have found
customer_reviews.text: It is the closest to a waterbed comfortable sleep we have found. We have no pressure points as a regular mattress produces. This is our second one we will continue to order when needs to be replaced So glad we can get at amazon prime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it until...
customer_reviews.text: Update: after a few months the product started to tear and a couple of months after that the product is almost severed in half. No longer happy with this purchase. Will replace it with a 3" different brand.
customer_reviews.author: J Mal

customer_reviews.title: The search is over.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed that I did not buy this sooner. I've had hip pain from the springs in my Serta Temperpedic?? for about a year now. This mattress pad makes my bed feel like a freaking cloud. It's so comfortable its ridiculous. I bought the 2". I am a 250 pound woman and my weight is in my mid section. It supports me well. It is ridiculously comfortable. Its supportive. I don't notice any heat differences between this and without. It poofed up in less than a couple hours. Little to no smell. HIGHLY recommend this. Don't bother with an expensive new mattress. Get this. I'm so glad I did. Thanks Linenspa!
customer_reviews.author: Angel J.

customer_reviews.title: Sleeps REALLY hot!
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have given more weight to the reviews that said this created really hot sleeping conditions. I've had it on my bed a week and REALLY WANTED to like this mattress topper. Unfortunately the reviews have proven to be correct. I'm using exactly the same bedding as before I put this on my bed and it is just insufferably hot and I cannot sleep when it's hot! It might work for someone who is always cold and liked more warmth when sleeping but it definitely doesn't work for me. I will be sending it back as this is just too much money to spend on something that I can't use.
customer_reviews.author: Trish87109Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Has a rip in a month
customer_reviews.text: This topper seemed to be ok. Didn’t feel like real memory foam. Just foam. After a month of use it has a large tear in it. I’m not a heavy person and it has a straight cut right across where my hips would be on the bed. I’m extremely upset about this and now I see past reviews showing that same problem. I want a refund! It wasn’t expensive but it just shouldn’t have happened. I don’t move around much when I’m sleeping so there is no excuse for this.
customer_reviews.author: NBDB

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and great for my bad back.
customer_reviews.text: I love this and have no problems at all. I actually use it for fold out couch as those mattresses are never comfortable and what a difference this makes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress topper
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a hospital bed to aid with comfort, airflow and reduce pressure points. Mattresses that come with hospital beds are not that comfortable so adding this mattress topper with its convoluted gel swirl memory foam works great and adds so much more comfort. and airflow to prevent sweating and helps to reduce pressure points. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I have one for my king bed and everyone that sleeps on this buys ones, best money spent for hot summer nights.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Miserably hot. Do not buy .
customer_reviews.text: Extremely hot. I didn’t mind it in the cold weather but with 60 degree nights, this is unbearable!
customer_reviews.author: A. Claiborne

customer_reviews.title: Slept worse on account of this
customer_reviews.text: I had the 3" topper on my bed for about a week.... and don't like it at all 1) uncomfortable to sleep on my sides due to the "spikes" pressing into my ribs... 2) sags too much in the middle which I find uncomfortable 3) I wake up due to heat I took the topper off about a week ago and have been sleeping better since. It's folded up in the corner of my room. I am going to return it once I find a larger box.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a cloud in heaven (if you believe in that) otherwise just sleeping on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my first apartment and I have missed so much class because it is so comfy I can't make myself get out of bed. I LOVE this product its definitely worth it and its a great price for a mattress topper. From the pic it looks like the little mountains could be uncomfortable but they feel good and are not individually noticeable when you lay down. 2 Inches also sounds think compared to the other 3 or 4 inch options but I had a 3 inch my freshman and sophomore year and don't notice a difference at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tyra Whye

customer_reviews.title: Amazing thick comfort, looove it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Dragged it out of the box as soon as it came and we left it to plump up for about 1.5 hours, there was a little plastic-like smell, but it had been encased in a plastic lining so *shrug* it was gone by the time it had smoothed and plumped itself up. It is AMAZING to sleep on. We had an equally expensive eggshell-type pad from BBBeyond, not even CLOSE to the same comfort. It’s pike sinking into heaven. I don’t get hot on it, super soft and squishy (I hate firm/hard beds) so completely satisfied and more. Happy clam over here!
customer_reviews.author: CJ M.

customer_reviews.title: please save your money
customer_reviews.text: I'm beginning to believe I will never find a mattress topper that helps with my pressure points, bonus with this one, now I have back pain, that I didn't have before, please save your money
customer_reviews.author: MZD2UTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have a severe back injury from a motor vehicle accident a couple of years ago, and have trouble sleeping. I received this item yesterday 3/7/18, and had the best night's sleep in years!
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this foam pad for my sister for college since I remembered the beds not being very comfortable. It was perfect. The twin XL was exactly the right size for her dorm bed (maybe a little tight in the sheets, but it worked fine) and added a lot of comfort to a stiff bed and made it feel more like home for her. Although she couldn't see the color of the pad when it was on her bed, she loved the blue color!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great for back pain
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Fits the bed perfectly. Great for easing sciatic pain. Very comfortable. Before this, I was tossing and turning for hours trying to get comfortable. Cons: Trying to find bedsheets with deep enough pockets to fully cover the sides of the bed with the topper on. Some of the foam has pieces that have chipped off due to regular wear and tear. Hoping this lasts longer than a year before it falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for his dorm bed at university. It came all scrunched up with a big fold in the middle but with a few hours the fold was gone and it was all fluffed nicely. I tried it out and it was super comfy. He has only slept on it a few nights but he says it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Like Laying on a Cloud!
customer_reviews.text: I love this overlay! I have tried other gel overlays and had to remove before morning but this one is fabulous!! I’ve been using at least a month now and still holding up! Your body sinks in and in conforms to your body yet when you move it fluffs back up! Doesn't create sunken in ruts that you fall into! So happy with this and sleeping better!
customer_reviews.author: ThatWorks4Me

customer_reviews.title: Not a solution for people with bad backs.
customer_reviews.text: I've slept on it 3 nights and I'm not very happy with it. I got it to help ease pressure points in my back. It pops back up when you get out of bed but its flat while laying on it. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It tends to sleep hot with me, but I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I put this topper on my 14 year old Tempurpedic mattress to extend it's life and prop up a little bit of the "body dip" that set in. I am a back sleeper, so it feels comfortable, but it does tend to get warm. I use very light weight sheets even in the winter to combat the heat. I find it difficult to flip onto my side, but thankfully I'm more of a back sleeper. I plan on purchasing a firm tempurpedic mattress in the future and will buy one of these toppers to give it some softness.
customer_reviews.author: A P

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 3 in. I use to use egg crate foam awhile back so I do expect usage wear and tear, I also use a matterss protectant cover over it first before putting my sheets on and it saves on the wear and tear. Thin egg crate will tear very easy. I have a lot of pain from health issues and the 2 or 3 inch is more recommended. I love mine. And if and when it needs replacing I will buy another one like the 3 inch I have now.
customer_reviews.author: Stana Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress topper!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to go on top of my mattress instead of getting a new one. My daughter reccomended this one. She purchased one for her bed when she was pregnant. My mattress wasn't old, just a little too firm for me. Best decision ever!! I sleep better now than I ever have. I feel rested when I wake up and have NO lower back pain at all. That is saying alot, as I have fibromyalgia. Definitely reccomend this product!
customer_reviews.author: A.Dillard

customer_reviews.title: The topper from Hell
customer_reviews.text: Buying this has been a bad decision and I cannot even use it. The Gel Foam is disintegrating or breaking down and getting all over my bedroom and all of my other bedding. I was also getting something in my eyes and had no idea what it was until I discovered the source. I do not know what this topper is made of but it is not stable and now I will just have to throw it out unless they will pay for me to ship it back. What a mess and a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: No help at all
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to report that this is very firm and uncomfortable and has not improved my sleep at all. I wake up in pain and cannot get comfortable. If I could, I would send it back. I am no further ahead for buying it.
customer_reviews.author: MichiganMag

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I no longer get pressure soreness when I sleep. Very comfortable and cushy. I got the 3" one hoping my sheets would still fit. Two sets do but the older sets don't. I needed new sheets anyway. I haven't noticed if I stay cool at night with the gel foam but it keeps me warm on cold night. Good buy and we're happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: vleller

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and No Smell
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. The last one lasted about a year before it started cracking, but you have to believe that is a lot of hours in use. I liked it because it does not have the heavy smell that people complain about with other mattress toppers. It makes for no pressure points so you sleep like your in a nest.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: If its hot outside and you don't have air conditioning the mattress get hot.
customer_reviews.text: I would have to say that while lying on the mattress for a while it felt hot. That was disappointing. I bought for my husband who was quite ill, already had bed sores, and was in significant pain. It was an improvement over our regular mattress. I'm rating it on his experience. We do not have air conditioning and it was hot outside.
customer_reviews.author: Cal Gal

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but rips easily.
customer_reviews.text: I love this topper, however I have only had it for 7 months and it has a very large rip in the middle. Apparently there is a warranty, but I am not able to find any information about it. Otherwise, super comfortable and I am sad that I'll have to get a different one likely from a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent for relieving hip pain.
customer_reviews.text: I sleep much better now. However, they sure packaged it terribly. It arrived with a hole in the box the size of a salad plate, which had been covered up with clear packing tape. Looked very ghetto.
customer_reviews.author: BJW

customer_reviews.title: Boo hiss.  Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. This sad little thing never fully expanded (after a week of trying), but it did manage to expand enough that it took 2 of us to get it compressed back into a box and crammed into my vehicle to drop at the UPS store. What a horrible mess. It’s not like it didn’t fully fluff out, it never even reached it’s full size dimensions either.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Belfi

customer_reviews.title: Great at first....  Now its terrible
customer_reviews.text: I started noticing small cracks between the bumps about 2 months after I started using it. now they have spread about halfway down, and if you move around if seperates leaving you with an uneven sleeping surface. I wish I knew which brand my ikea topper is, because it's still good after many years
customer_reviews.author: alksdfjapoisfuo

customer_reviews.title: Really refresed a tired mattress
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid I should've gotten a 3" because of the shape. But idk that the extra money would've really been worth it. It doesn't go flat and stays breathable. Seems like it could be fragile if pets were to climb on it though. Still a very good value. It's well made regardless. Exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Clark

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.....
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this did not last long. And for the price I’m greatly disappointed. I will reach out to the seller since my return window was only 30 days and that passed last week while I was on vacation using the mat. But as you can see the whole thing literally cracked and is now useless. I will revise my post when I get an answer from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Katie's mama

customer_reviews.title: DEFINITELY WORTH THE INVESTMENT!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the foam mattress pad. My wife and I are sleeping 800% better and waking up rested and almost completely pain-free which is saying a lot compared to how it used to be. We would wake up with joint stiffness, lower back pain and a general sense of irritation from poor sleep. Thank you so much for your product, we are delighted with it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Buescher

customer_reviews.title: Great item / Cushions and Cools too hot bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this soften my Temperpedic mattress. Not only does it give a nice cushion but it definitely helps cool it off. A little hard to get one of my sheet sets over it but other sheets I have fit it fine. I am happy with the purchase and the price. I bought it in king size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and helps cooling, however, about 2in too short
customer_reviews.text: Definitely made my college mattress MUCH more comfortable. I can no longer feel the individual bed springs and don't sweat in bed anymore. My only complaint is that the cover should be about two inches longer and one inch wider. However, this could only be an issue with my specific bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I've originally purchased this last August 24, 2018 and it was not lasted long. Since this has 3 year warranty, Ive already claimed 2 replacements topper from them. My 3rd replacement has more compress/small design of egg crates. hope it will last long
customer_reviews.author: Jayson C

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love! We own two of these and I highly recommend them to my family members. Great value for the money. can make even the firmest bed very comfortable while maintaining support. Would buy this product over and over again. Ships quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Radiantms

customer_reviews.title: Let it air out for at least 24 hours!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I had my older egg crate for 7 years and decided I needed an upgrade. I put this one on top of my current egg crate. I love the 3in it really raises the bed which is great. I feel like I'm in a cloud with this and my down comforter! You really do kinda "sink" into it if you're into that sorta thing. It took some getting use to but I already think I'm getting quality sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Qn size for my bed! What a difference in the quality of sleep I get at night! I used to toss and turn but now I sleep so comfortable, it's like sleeping on a cloud! The product came wrapped and folded but I laid it out and within a couple hours it was fully ready to place on my mattress. I thought there would be a smell as some others have experienced, but no smells. An overall excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Emme

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress topper is awesome! I have hip bursitis and it has helped tremendously with getting a good night sleep. I was a bit apprehensive when I read reviews of the pad ripping or tearing shortly after purchasing. I have 2 large dogs that jump on and off the bed all day and sleep with me at night. I placed my mattress topper on top of the mattress but under the mattress cover (that I purchased with my mattress) and it hasn't shown any signs of wear. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi H Helmer

customer_reviews.title: Aaahhh... so comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have a firmer textured memory foam mattress, and having this on top is just the right amount of softness to sink into while still getting good support. The cooling gel in it is nice too as I tend to get hot flashes at night.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.  Cracked upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: Material was already splitting upon delivery. Tried sleeping on it anyway felt too thin for me. I could feel mattress beneath and I weigh less than 140. Slept a little hot even though I bought gel option
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Finally I can sleep and wake up and still be able to walk! Our mattress isn’t old, but it’s not the most comfortable. I needed something that would help with the pain I was having and this is working perfectly! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in March 2020 and today I notice this! NOT HAPPY. This is not cheap and it has only lasted 6 months. And no we are not heavy people. My husbands side of the bed and he is like 175#. Do NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Camille Thomas

customer_reviews.title: open before use to fluff out
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is using this for her dorm room bed. We did not realize you are supposed to unroll the pad and let it fluff up for 24 hours prior to putting it on the bed for use. She still thinks it is comfortable, and enjoys it very much, but for any future buyers out there, be sure to take it out of the package ahead of time and give it the 24 hour window to properly fluff up. It came vacuum sealed and was kind of flat at first. I can see where letting it fluff up awhile ahead of time would make it even more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Holt

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cool.
customer_reviews.text: I put this on top of a basic Sleep Number bed. It gives me just the right amount of cushion, and the egg crate top helps with airflow. Relieves pressure points. The cooling gel keeps it comfortable all night. Save yourself $1000; just get this topper instead of a new mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Man I sleep so good on this thing! I read where ppl said it made them hot, so bought a Serta cooling topper. I also have good quality, cool cotton sheets. I sink in to it and think it's just wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: QualityMatters

customer_reviews.title: Stays cool for the most part
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I anticipated. I had a 3" memory foam topper that would get so hot, so I bought this one in hopes that it wouldn't hold heat like the other one. It still gets warm, but it's worth it because the pad is so comfortable. I think the egg crate shape has a lot to do with it. I have a soft pillow top mattress cover that I put over it, so it gives the carton texture a softer feel. I've had it a little over a week now and I can't remember the last time I slept so well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this a try instead of replacing my bed. It is very comfortable and has eliminated my soar back and arms from falling asleep at night. The directions said to let it puff up for 24 hours before use. It was ready to use in less than 2 hours. I love this product and recommend it for others who need some cush and support added to their mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Great sleep
customer_reviews.text: This pad has been a Godsend. Helped make a superfirm mattress bearable. Able to roll up, move, unroll & it retained shape. Will try to buy a smaller version for hotel bed travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged right off the bat.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today. Opened it up to air out and it has a tear in the material near the bottom right.
customer_reviews.author: Jean h.

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a cloud!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my nonmemory foam topper. It fits perfect with my regular sheets and a mattress pad over it. It took a few hours to puff up and get rid of the smell. If you need firmness this is not for you. It does get a little hot but it doesn’t bother me, although I am just one body in the bed. I’d buy it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but does not last
customer_reviews.text: This topper was purchased when the old cheaper egg crate needed to be replaced. Had the other one for many years. This one was prettier and much more comfortable than the old one. Pretty doesn't matter since you only see it when changing sheets. This one started cracking last year and each time I see it the crack gets bigger and crumbles more.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Gel?
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a standard memory foam topper with blue dye swirled into it during production. Don't assume that there is a pocket of cooling gel or anything of that kind. The material retains heat similar to other memory foam products.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: It has only been a couple nights so I will edit it needed but I was having major back pain on my mattress and couldn’t afford to buy another kind mattress so I gave this topper a shot and it has been great gives my firm mattress a softer feel and a much better nights rest.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Sibiski

customer_reviews.title: Not supportive at all
customer_reviews.text: My husband sunk so bad on this he took it off. And of course there's no way to return it once unpacked. Made him hurt worse than the firm bed! Now I wasted $100+ on it.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline M. Mutters

customer_reviews.title: Brittle
customer_reviews.text: Cracked and torn in places when we got it. Pieces fell off when we changed the sheets.
customer_reviews.author: January

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart
customer_reviews.text: Lasted less than 3 months. Started getting large holes in it like someone sliced it with a knife. Also the material is degrading and every time I changed the sheets I have small blue particles going everywhere. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Other than that I find it very comfortable and so far I like it
customer_reviews.text: I would give this five stars but it does tend to go flat where my hips are and takes some time to go back. Other than that I find it very comfortable and so far I like it. I left it out a few days before putting it on my bed. No smell but I use it under my mattress pad.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Tomberlin

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Great quality and super soft. Turns a normal bed surface into a comfy fun texture.
customer_reviews.author: Scottie W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice padding, helps with painful pressure points
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for nearly two months, and am still happy with it. It doesn't completely take care of painful pressure points, but does help quite a bit! Stays cool, which is important to me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Egg crate in memory foam
customer_reviews.text: It seems pretty comfortable. I’m fighting an achy back in the am. This has helped, not 100%, but better. I have not slept on it in warm weather, so can’t say whether it sleeps hot or cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As expected for 2 inch mail order foam
customer_reviews.text: About what I expected for 2 inch foam. I just wanted minimal layer of softness between me and a firm mattress. Mission accomplished. It fully formed within 24 hours out of the box. It is not dense so I imagine it will flatten at some point. If you're looking for a memory foam mattress like experience, I suggest the 4 inch or something more dense
customer_reviews.author: Darian L.

customer_reviews.title: Memory foam is good, but strange
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s nice, really fluffy. But after 3 months it became dirty yellow on the edges! I don’t sleep on the edge, so I can’t blame me there. It’s still nicely blue in the middle. So I don’t know why, but now it’s partly yellow. That’s why 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Polina

customer_reviews.title: Complete satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: I sleep great on this mattress pad and I am a big man 6’ 4” 350lbs. It’s holding up well so far I’ve had it 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Claude

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful topper
customer_reviews.text: So... I normally do not post reviews, but this is fantastic. I have 2 herniated discs and previously had purchased another topper that was memory foam and was 4 inches. Bad mistake, while it was comfortable, waaayyyy to soft for someone that has a herniated disc. This was my second chance, and boy am I glad I selected this. 2 inch topper is great, not too soft and I absolutely love the egg crate topper. I’ve had that before during my college years, and forgot how comfortable it can be. Definitely great topper that I’m so glad I picked.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Soft and squishy
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my 7 year olds bed because the mattress is super cheap and hard. It has made a world of difference. My sister sleeps on it when she comes to town to visit and she said it was very squishy and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: PrincessAubree78

customer_reviews.title: Feels like Heaven
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about these mattress pads. Feels like you are laying on clouds. We bought two of the queen size for each of our beds. We bought sleep so much better and wake us not nearly as sore.
customer_reviews.author: THERESA

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: This was good enough for me to keep, but I do plan on replacing it eventually. I just don’t think it has as much cushion as it should, and it gets really hot. It also has an odd fit and slides around quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Not what they claim and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not even 24 hrs and I wish I had not bought this mattress topper. It was ripped on arrival and it's not even inflating in some spots. It says 3 inches but it's 2 the egg crate spikes mke it 3. I will probably have to eat this 100 bucks because returning it will be a nightmare
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Very bad
customer_reviews.text: Very bad, sleep very uncomfortable, very hot, but also easy to break, open the packaging, very occupy seats, want to return
customer_reviews.author: Grace Claire

customer_reviews.title: I made the right choice when I purchased this mattress topper.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sleeping. Molds to your body, but eggshell top allows air pockets to regulate body heat. Not too hot, not too cold. No twinges in my back when I roll out of bed in the morning. I let it air out for 12 hours upon removing from the box, more to ensure the shape was good than due to any odor, which was very mild and unnoticeable after about 30 minutes. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is incredible find. Love it for making all the difference in old mattress we have. It has amazing support and comfort
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Fragile and tears
customer_reviews.text: This item is two months old and has split ...between the raised portions....in many areas of the topper, especially in the outer areas. I turned it over, to try to get a little more time with it....but it will not last long. I see others have had the same trouble...so order at your own risk. I would look for an older- type product. These newer materials dont hold up. Good Luck, if youve already ordered one.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Burke

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Perfect but only for a few months.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Until it falls apart. But it was cheap and only needed to for a year. It started deteriorating after 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonders!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our teen daughter who was complaining of back pain which was causing her sleepless nights. Within 3 days of sleeping on this her back pain was gone. Great price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: cody brandt

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Got a king bed with firm mattress for my husband and got this for my side. Pretty good night sleep, comfy. However it slides on the bed and makes an awful squishing, squeaking, sound when you sit or lay on it.
customer_reviews.author: sparklyfungus

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sleep on a sleeper sofa
customer_reviews.text: Fought this for our sleeper sofa so when guests come they have a place to sleep and it did wonders! My husband & I even slept on it one night while my in-laws were in town and got some good sleep! I’m sure it would be a dream on an actual bed.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!!!! I got the 3in depth topper. I have always been a stomach sleeper so i have to have a super comfortable base beneath myself. This foam toppper is sooo soft but not too soft where your alignment is off but super soft where it feels like you are sleeping on a cloud. Great purchase...for someone who wants to get a good nights sleep and fight dark circles/bags under their eyes lol!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not super
customer_reviews.text: Could not tell any difference at all when we used this. Not very happy with purchase. Go for something thicker
customer_reviews.author: Rick Curry

customer_reviews.title: Wish it didn't have the convoluted top
customer_reviews.text: The convoluted side doesn't seem to add any benefit to the pad. If it was solid on both sides there would be more material for support. Just my opinion I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: D C

customer_reviews.title: TOPPER IS SUPER HOT!
customer_reviews.text: Great topper for the price. The biggest flaw that I have with this mattress topper is that it gets super HOT and becomes uncomfortable. We had bought the Cal King and slept with it only 1 night. Had to remove it due to the heat that it holds. Mind you we have AC in our home and as well as a bedroom fan.
customer_reviews.author: C.R.E.

customer_reviews.title: like sleeping on a cloud.
customer_reviews.text: Sink into this at night and I dare you to have a bad nights sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Fox

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased yes.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. Using it as a topper for the linenspa 6 in innerspring daybed mattress. Perfect combination. I am finally getting comfortable sleep and waking up virtually pain-free.
customer_reviews.author: Faith R.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this mattress topper. Finally, i can wake up with no back pain. Im very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa G.

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Suuuper comfortable! Maybe slightly cooler than the foam topper we had before, but I don't think it makes a huge difference in temperature. However, it's really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

product_meta.title: Linenspa 2 Inch Convoluted Gel Swirl Memory Foam Mattress Topper - Promotes Airflow - Relieves Pressure Points - Queen
feature_bullets: Light and breathable open cell memory foam molds to the contours of your body to relieve pressure point aches while you sleep
Convoluted, egg crate design provides maximum airflow and comfort by evenly dispersing your body weight
Mesmerizing blue swirl design creates a fun and cool sleep environment; swirl design may vary
Both 2" and 3" profiles have the same feel to help soften an uncomfortable sleep surface; a thicker topper will result in a deeper sink that cradles your body more than a thinner topper
Soften up a hard mattress, prolong mattress life, and add an extra spring to your step with this rejuvenating topper; backed by a 3-year warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,179 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 3-year u. S. Warranty guards against manufacturer defect.
specifications.Included Components: Linenspa 2 Inch Convoluted Gel Swirl Memory Foam Mattress Topper
